name: Email Marketing Services – Integration for Jetpack CRM
author: Jahidur Nadim

sections.description:
Email Marketing Services – Integration for the Jetpack CRM plugin lets you Import all of your contacts from popular newsletter services to Jetpack CRM. With easy setup of this plugin enables an efficient way of gathering contacts.

This plugin uses background process to import contacts, so it won’t slow down your website.

Major features in this integration includes:

  • Importing contacts to Jetpack CRM
  • Currently supports:
  • Sendinblue ( only imports existing contacts )

Support

For custom support please send me an email to: jahidurnadim@gmail.com

Credit

Logo: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/mail_4185664
Banner: https://unsplash.com/@roeldierckens
sections.installation:
1. Automatic
    Go to Dashboard and under Plugins menu click ‘Add new’ then ‘Upload Plugin’ button and upload ems-jetpack-crm zip file.

OR

  1. Manually
    Upload it on wp-content/plugins/ directory

Activate it, and setup in ‘EMS for CRM’ menu in Dashboard.
You’re done! Please wait for some time and you will see contacts started importing to Jetpack CRM.
sections.faq:
Will more services come soon?

Yes, hopefully.
